name: The greatest book ever written?
description:
P&P Included.

	Is this the greatest book ever written? Or a sketchbook that would make the Marquis De Sade blush? How the contents of this sketchpad turn out is entirely up to you.

name: 3D website interface
description: This is a 3D website interface which is designed to be easily editable with a little flash know-how. The content is dynamic loading, allowing you to to edit images and video streams without using Flash and change the text content via an XML editor (notepad being the most simple) Delivery : the files can be either emailed or posted to you. Requirements : Flash CS3. You will need basic knowledge of Flash CS3. No programming is required for basic use, only the ability to edit a button name which is a basic process. Expansion : If you would like to buy the interface but have no Flash access, we can edit the files to your requirements at a small additional cost. Please email info@fusiblefront.com to arrange this service. use this link for an example : http://www.flashden.net/files/27052/index.html

name: Draw Closer
description:
P&P Included.

	An illustration book by Glasgow School of Art graduate Laura Frame, featuring poetry and quotes by Saul Williams(writer, actor and musician) from his book “S/HE”.

See some inside pages at www.myspace.com/laurasillustration.
